a yellow trivalent metallic element of the rare earth group ; occurs in monazite and bastnasite in association with cerium and lanthanum and praseodymium .一种稀土属黄色多价元素，与铈、镧、镨共生于独居石和氟碳锑矿中。

means.word_mean: 1. a yellow-to-brown mineral that is a source of rare earth elements
